summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a tree-lined urban road. The road is relatively clear with a few parked cars on both sides. A pedestrian is seen crossing the road from the right side at 6.0s, and another pedestrian is seen on the right side of the road at 9.0s.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed and direction throughout the segment. The vehicle does not need to take any evasive actions as the road is clear and the pedestrians do not pose an immediate threat.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A pedestrian, approximately 5 meters away, crossing the road at 6.0s. 2) Right side: A pedestrian, approximately 10 meters away, walking along the sidewalk at 9.0s.

summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a tree-lined urban road. There are pedestrians walking on the sidewalks on both sides. A cyclist is seen on the right side of the road, moving forward. The vehicle ahead is maintaining a steady speed.
actions: The self-vehicle is driving at a consistent speed, maintaining a safe distance from the vehicle ahead. The vehicle is staying in its lane and there are no sudden changes in speed or direction.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A cyclist, approximately 10 meters away, moving forward along the sidewalk. 2) Front: A vehicle, approximately 30 meters away, maintaining a steady speed.
